charges.charge_disposition: Dft. pleaded GUILTY as to ct 1 of the information on 8/4/98. Dft. is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 12 MONTHS., for a total term of custody in conjunction w/case 3:98CR-27-S--117 MONTHS. Upon release dft. shall be on supervised release for a 1 YR. Dft. shall pay an assessment in the amount of $25.00 and RESTITUTION in the amount of $5,129.07. (1)

Dft. pleaded GUILTY as to ct 1 of the information on 8/4/98. Dft. is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 12 MONTHS to be served CONCURRENTLY w/the 57 MONTHS in case 3:98CR-27-S. Upon release from imprisonment, the dft. shall be on supervised release for a term of 3 YRS. Dft. shall pay an assessment in the amount of $25.00 and RESTITUTION in the amount of $5,129.07. (1)

Dft. pleaded GUILTY to ct 1 of the information on 8/4/98. Dft. is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 12 MONTHS, to be served CONCURRENT w/the terms of ct 1-2 of case 3:98CR-27-S. Dft. is on supervised release for a term of 3 YRS. Dft. shall pay an assessment in the amount of $25.00 and RESTITUTION in the amount of $5,129.07. (1)
